data.text: @DrJ56013122 @MDinCanada Well, if you are going to create a market for a new 💉 you got market the 💩 out of it. Push fear to create “need”
@MDinCanada I would like to know the same time info for Canada.
@MDinCanada So what? If it saves $10 billion in Medicare costs it’s money well spent. Which is actually entirely possible.
@DrJ56013122 @MDinCanada I certainly was and so many people fell for it. It will be a while for most to recover their “common-sense”.
@MDinCanada Wow! There’s a massive list of organizations who were recruited and paid to promote vaccines. This has to be the largest propaganda campaign ever mounted.
@MDinCanada Those billions went to legacy media to only say positive things about the vaccines. Even a lot of small media has been bought off.
